mapper.insert: insert into RM_EVENT_NOTIFIED_INFO ( NOTIFIED_USER, NOTIFIED_FLAG, NOTIFIED_TIME, REPORT_TIME, REF_EVENT_ID, NOTIFIED_MANAGER, CALL_FLAG, EVENT_TYPE ) values ( #{notifiedUser}, #{notifiedFlag}, #{notifiedTime}, #{reportTime}, #{refEventId}, #{notifiedManager}, #{callFlag}, #{eventType} )
mapper.select:
SELECT nt.NOTIFIED_MANAGER as manegers, nt.NOTIFIED_USER as users, ve.VENUES_ADDRES as arr, ve.VENUES_NAME as nm, nt.EVENT_TYPE as event
FROM RM_EVENT_NOTIFIED_INFO nt join rm_event_info ev on nt.REF_EVENT_ID=ev.EVENT_ID left join rm_venues_info ve on ve.VENUES_ID=ev.REL_VENUES_ID where ev.EVENT_TYPE='01' and nt.NOTIFIED_FLAG='03' and nt.CALL_FLAG='0'
